backend/main.mo: Actor implements admin-gated decommission mode, contact and appointment submissions, and domain draft storage using AccessControl and Map.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI, responsiveness, and accessibility changes with affected files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing key frontend pages, components, forms, hooks, and styling files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style definitions using OKLCH variables for light/dark themes and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file defining metadata, icons, SEO tags, and mounting root for the React app.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots file allowing all crawlers and specifying sitemap location.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Sitemap listing main site routes with priorities and change frequencies.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for all main pages wrapped in SiteLayout.
frontend/src/components/forms/Appointmen: React form handling appointment submissions with validation, department selection, error feedback, and success state.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: A contact form component with validation, submission via hook, and success/error handling.
Renders a styled page hero section with title, subtitle, optional badge, and variant backgrounds.
frontend/src/components/layout/Section.t: Generic layout wrapper that renders a section with variant background styles.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays footer with branding, contact info, hours, and hospital details.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Header with emergency bar, navigation, branding, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout wrapper providing header, footer, SEO manager, and skip link.
frontend/src/components/seo/Organization: Injects JSON-LD structured data describing the medical organization.
frontend/src/components/seo/SeoManager.t: Dynamically updates meta tags, title, canonical URL, and social tags based on route.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Defines hospital name and a helper for generating branded page titles.
frontend/src/config/contactDetails.ts: Centralized contact details with helper functions for emergency and phone links.
frontend/src/config/seo.ts: Defines SEO config, route metadata, and helpers for titles, descriptions, and URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity context and provider to manage authentication, identity loading, and login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitAppointmentR: Provides a mutation hook that submits appointment request data to the backend via the actor with error normalization.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitContact.ts: Provides a mutation hook that submits contact form data to the backend via the actor with error normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with a medical-focused color palette.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider setup.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission, vision, and core values using cards and themed sections.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentRequestPag: Displays the appointment request workflow with steps and a form wrapped in styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact details and a contact form, including emergency info and contact links.
frontend/src/pages/DecommissionedPage.ts: Displays a notice that the site is decommissioned and updates the page title accordingly.
frontend/src/pages/DoctorsPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/DomainDraftPage.tsx: Empty page file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyPage.tsx: Renders the emergency services page with a hero section, call button, service cards, and guidance on when to seek emergency care.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a hero section, appointment and Google search actions, and featured medical team imagery.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Shows a 404 page with messaging and a button to return home.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a hero section and a grid of medical services with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme settings, colors, typography, container settings, and custom utilities.
project_state.json: Defines the project state for improving a hospital websiteâ€™s visual quality, listing existing UI, responsive, accessibility, and imagery features. Includes required images, project metadata, and one pending feature request.
